Nice place where you can have a big burger and frech fries with friends. Good beer! Stylish inside, pleasant outside. The position is good to make a tour in the city and have a dinner.

column7: Not the best food. The other Viggos is way much better

column7: not what it used to be
column9: The place is not what it used to be. For the last year or so it lost all the charm it had. Boring meat, unpleasant service.

The chips are ok. Everything else is overpriced bland crap. Oh, and speaking of crap, that's what the place smells like. No, I'm not exaggerating, the whole place smells really strongly of backed up toilet. It's ok for a beer outside, but hold your nose...More

column7: Probably the best... burger... in Lund
column9:
This restaurant is located right at the train station in Lund. It's small, bordering on cramped, especially if the patio is not open.

Service during lunch is adequate, haven't tried the dinner service. The food you want here would be burgers, but they do sell...More

A typical modern Swedish restaurant and bar. Aspirations to the Parisian style of roadside outdoor dining but not quite there. Very young personell, willing but not very experienced. The food is nothing to complain about but not anything to really impress with either

Best burger evr! First time order came out wrong. Second time absolutely bäst i världen!!!

We will eat here every day forever and ever and ever and ever and omg how many words can you write with 100 signs?!

A wide selection of hamburgers and some rather strange choises. Large portions with fries. The food was ok but, nothing more. The place reminds me of an rather shabby road house. The patio was'nt much better. A place to fill your stomac and that's it.

column7: Nice place in the center of the town. Good menu, lots of food to choose
column9:
This pub is in the heart of Lund, and serves a lot of different food as well as different kind of beer. 
Price is average with respect to same quality restaurants nearby.
If you pass by, it is worth a try.

column7: Poor service, cold buidling but ok chips
